summary: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 45382, said ordinance being entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of building and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts of other open spaces; establishing districts for said repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28, 1923; and adding thereto two new sections to be known respectively as Section 2 (LLL) and Section 17 (LLL).
